channel.title: machine learning on Indro Spinelli
channel.description: Recent content in machine learning on Indro Spinelli

item.title: Seminar on Graph Neural Networks
item.description: Here you can find an introduction to the world of graph neural networks (GNN for short). This family of models is able process graph structured data and solve many interesting tasks.

item.title: FairDrop @ USI
item.description: Reacently I had the pleasure of talking about graphs and fairness at “Universit√† della Svizzera Italiana”. The talk was hosted by the Graph Machine Learning Group of Prof. Cesare Alippi and organized by Daniele Grattarola. For a buch of slides look Here.
